TopicTitle: The Number War: Count to 100 or -100

Articles.Content:
-6

Surrender now, or feel the Kraken's grasp later (on a particularly hard mission in KSP, no doubt)
The Kraken is no match for my file editing! -5

-6

As you wish, mortals...
badS = True. -5

-6

The Kraken's will is infinite.
-4 nor for my nine backups of my KSP saves folder (I Have ALOT of mods)

M1 = 60. M0 = 0. Try and stop me now. -5

EDIT: NO! Not this again!
-4 Traitors never prosper...
You're looking in the wrong direction. -3 [i swear, if it happens below...]

-5

The rules speak clear.
-2. Clearly...
-1 Indeed, I was wondering why that was wrong.
-3 Let's go gentle into that good night

0. Especially considering his line of work...

EDIT: I swear to god...

1. Back to the unit at the base of all mathematics.

(edit: I think some ninjas happened on second thought, as I read back)
2. Did we hire Shelby? Also, even prime number.

3. First Odd Prime

(I am going to refrain from adding until a negative posts, to follow rules, from now on)
2 The Kraken is not pleased, for those who help may they prosper.
1 haa
That's my cue. 2
1 The Kraken grasps at your positive numbers and flings them into an escape orbit from Kerbol.
Well I can always edit them back. 2
You make a fair point. 1
2. Indeed, they do.

There we go again... (feel free to call me names)

7. In the case of two or more posts from two or more different people being posted at the same time(give or take a minute) trying to subtract/add to the same number simultaneously , the post that appears last on the thread counts toward the change in the current number. This is to avoid needless confusion and people can simply read the last post to continue the game.

Quoting first relevant valid post, you can confirm the rest yourself (and you should, in case I'm wrong).

badS = True. -5

Deutherius: -6 (nulled by next post)

The Laythe Initiative: -4 (posted at the same time, overwriting me)

Xannari: -5 (valid, even though unintentionally subtracting - this is why you should state the operation you want to do, avoids confusion)

The Laythe Initiative: -4 (valid)

Xannari: -3 (nulled by next post)

Deutherius: -5 (posted at the same time, overwriting Xannari. Last valid post.)

Xannari: -2 (not valid, even if his previous post would be - remember that you have to string valid numbers with at least one other person)

And not even 5 minutes later you did it again with mythbuster.

I know it's just a game, but it has rules. For a good reason. And if you're wondering, no, I don't get a kick out of quoting rules and correcting people all the time. I'd be more than happy if everyone paid enough attention to get it right. (I might, however, get a kick out of keeping it to myself next time and using it much, much later)

So lets just slow down a bit to avoid problems like these, alright?

For ease of continuing: Game is at -5, set by Deutherius. (unless anyone proves me wrong, of course)
